import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MarcaService } from '../marca.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Marca } from '../models/marca.model'; @Component({ selector: 'gc-marca-list', templateUrl: './marca-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./marca-list.component.css'], }) export class MarcaListComponent { constructor(private marcaService: MarcaService) {} marcas: Marca[] = []; deleteMessage=false; }
